page.title: 05Survey of Trumpington
page.content:
The first survey that we did was near the town church. We asked a lady her general opinion about enter- tainment, she wanted more for teenagers and also more nightclubs.
Most of her shopping was done in Cambridge. She was about 30 years old, and her hobbies were Badmington and she often went to the Cambridge{Sports {Centre}(The Kelsey Kerridge.)
The next two were also women, and agreed on the same ideas. They also wanted a more effecient bus service. One was a barmaid and the other was a housewife.
The last person questioned was a man who was in his seventies said he enjoyed being alive.
